head.title: Wireless Ad Groups Plan to Merge

hedline.hl1: Wireless Ad Groups Plan to Merge

abstract.p: Wireless Ad Council of Internet Advertising Bureau in New York and Wireless Advertising Industry Assn in San Francisco will merge, forming Wireless Advertising Assn, to be based in New York (S)

block.p: The Wireless Ad Council of the Internet Advertising Bureau in New York and the Wireless Advertising Industry Association in San Francisco have agreed to merge, forming the Wireless Advertising Association, to be based in New York. A board and top leaders will be appointed next month, to be followed by elections in the fall. The merged association will help develop guidelines for ads to run in wireless media.
